description: Learn how to set up your first plan in Nexudus with this simple guide. This feature solves the problem of creating membership or service plans for your coworking space, making it easier to manage your offerings and customer subscriptions.
introduction_markdown:
This document provides a step-by-step guide on how to set up your first plan in Nexudus. Plans represent services customers subscribe to, and they usually represent your coworking memberships or private offices inventory. Plans can include benefits such as booking or printing credit, which will be assigned to customers signing up to them.

Some examples of basic plans include:

*   **Monthly Hot Desk:** Access to any available desk in a shared area.
*   **Dedicated Desk:** A permanent desk in a shared space, often with lockable storage.
*   **Private Office:** Lockable, fully furnished office for teams or individuals.
*   **Virtual Office:** Business address + mail handling + limited on-site access
*   **Evening / Weekend Access:** Discounted or specialized access for non-standard hours.
*   **Team Hot Desk / Office Packages**
*   **Hybrid Worker Plan:** e.g. 2â€“3 days/week office access.

Follow the steps below to create your first plan and streamline your coworking space management.

steps.step_title: Navigate to Plans and Add a New Plan

sub_steps.step_description_markdown: Go to **Inventory** in the left-hand navigation menu.
Click on **Plans** to access the plans settings.
Click the **Add plan** button to start creating a new plan.

steps.step_title: Select a Plan Type and Enter Plan Details

sub_steps.step_description_markdown: Choose a plan type. For this example, select **Manual entry**.
Enter the **Plan name**. In this case, type 'Dedicated Desk'.
Add a **Plan description**. In this case, type 'Dedicated Desk'.
Click on the **Pricing** tab.
Enter the **Price** for the plan. For example, set it to '750'.
Click **Save changes** to save the plan.
Click on the **Dedicated Desk** plan to open its details.
Navigate to the **Benefits** tab.
Click on **Add money credit** to add a money credit benefit.
Enter a **Credit description**. For example, type 'Meeting Room Credit'.
Enter the **Credit amount**. For example, set it to '150'.
Select the booking types this credit can be used for. Choose 'This credit can only be used to pay the following types of resources'.
Select the specific resources. For example, choose 'Large Meeting Rooms' and 'Small Meeting Rooms'.
Click **Save changes** to save the money credit benefit.
Click on the **Passes** tab.
Click on **Add pass** to add a pass benefit.
Select a **Pass**. For example, choose 'Day Pass'.
Enter the **Amount** of passes. For example, set it to '7'.
Set the **Expiration** for the passes. For example, choose 'Every week'.
Click **Save changes** to save the pass benefit.

title: How to Set Up Your First Plan
